thread.title: David Mundell pledges devolution of welfare powers
thread.title_full: David Mundell pledges devolution of welfare powers - The Scotsman

author: scotsman.com
title: David Mundell pledges devolution of welfare powers
text:
5
Have your say MSPs will be able to “top up” tax credits and child benefit payments as part of Holyrood’s new powers, Scottish Secretary David Mundell has said.
He said the Scotland Bill, which is currently going through Westminster, would be a “game-changer” that would usher in a “new era of devolution”.
The minister said: “We are on the threshold of a new era in devolution and the Scotland Bill will be a game-changer.
